import { Avatar, Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardHeader, CardMedia, Collapse, IconButton, Typography } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' const Drive = ({title,description,imageURL,userName,form}) => { return (
{userName} } title={title} subheader="September 14, 2016" /> {userName} {':'}{ description} {form}
) } export default Drive
